dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- payload.OnDemandRequest.attrList reduce ((val, acc = {interfaceName : payload.OnDemandRequest.interfaceName}) -> acc ++ (( { (val.attributeName) : ( val.attributeValue ) } )))
